page.title: 15Village Life:Hutton-le-Hole
page.content: Being a beautiful village, Hutton has attracted middle-class people seeking a peaceful retirement among tradition- al country people.Of approximately 180 villagers, 50% are retired and 60% are 'incomers'Relatively expensive housing and lack of public transport have caused this imbalance.66% of families own 1 car and 15%, 2 cars. 8 families with school-age children, have moved here during the last 4 years,mainly professional people working out of the village.The villagers are friendly,and age is no barrier in social events eg. WI,and the loyally supported church. Most people have flower and vegetable gardens and some have hens and pets. Nearly everyone enjoys and is inter- ested in their surroundings. In summer the character of the village changes externally,with the influx of tourists strolling around the 'green'.
